nodes.documentation:
Initializes the contract at the start of the network.
 Must be called by the constructor of `Initializer` contract on genesis block.
 This is used instead of `constructor()` because this contract is upgradable.
nodes.name: initialize

initialize(uint256).notice: Initializes the contract at the start of the network. Must be called by the constructor of `Initializer` contract on genesis block. This is used instead of `constructor()` because this contract is upgradable.
